items.title: RecPoker Community
items.subtitle: Ep 348 - Chats: Joe Stapleton and Josh Wilson on Comedy and NFTs!
items.excerpt: If you love poker you already know podcast host and commentator Joe Stapleton, who returns to the show to talk about comedy, commentating, and how various aspects of his professional career have been affected by the events of the last two years. We also get to meet Josh Wilson from CryptoHoldem, who talks to the panel about the different parts of cryptocurrencies and NFTs that seem to attract the poker-playing community. You can learn more about Josh and his live no limit texas holdem NFT community (where holders can win a trip to the WSOP!)

items.title: Holiday Hijinx (Feat. Joe Stapleton!)
items.subtitle: Episode 26 | Generation DAN
items.excerpt: We're full swing into the holiday season! So how do we celebrate? By having a poker commentator on as our guest of course! Joe Stapleton is with us (Caleb Mcduff is guest hosting too!) today as we talk through some of the crazy stuff we all got up to with our families growing up, plus a ton more!

items.title: RGPS: All-Star ProAm 2021
items.subtitle: Day 1
items.excerpt: Watch Day 1 of the 2021 RGPS: All-Stars ProAM live from the PokerGO Studio at ARIA Resort & Casino. The feature table is headlined by Joe Stapleton, Tyson Apostol, Jamie Kerstetter, Brad Owen, and 2021 World Champion Koray Aldemir, before a change sees Barstool Smitty, Danielle Andersen, Boston Rob Mariano, and PokerGO's Remko Rinkema join the action as the RGPS: All-Stars ProAM plays down to the final table of seven.

items.title: Poker Stories Podcast
items.subtitle: Comedian Joe Stapleton Talks About New Gambling Movie 'The Card Counter'
items.excerpt: Joe Stapleton got his start in the poker world at Card Player, working the WSOP while on hiatus from his job at Mad TV. The Albany, New York native then moved on to other projects, including writing and podcasting, and commentating work for a number of poker broadcasts and TV shows.
